name: You will MOLD
description:
You will MOLD

You are moldy, make the others mold as well!

W A S D or ←↑↓→ to Move

Spacebar to Jump

Shift to Dash

Spacebar Mid Air to Double Jump

Music - Guntaker01

Development and Art- ToastedGears

SFX - Chiptune
